ISSUE.TITLE: Manage group administrators
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ## Feature Request Thanks to the great work around #210 _signal-cli-rest-api_ will be able to manage group members with the next release The next step would be to show, add and remove group administrators. ### API proposal #### `GET /v1/groups/{number}` For each group include an array of admins: ```json { "admins": [ "string" ], "blocked": true, "id": "string", "internal_id": "string", "invite_link": "string", "members": [ "string" ], "name": "string", "pending_invites": [ "string" ], "pending_requests": [ "string" ] } ``` #### `GET /v1/groups/{number}/{groupid}` Include an array of admins similar like shown above. #### `POST /v1/groups/{number}/{groupid}/admins` Similar endpoint like for adding group members. ```json { "admins": [ "string" ] } ``` #### `DELETE /v1/groups/{number}/{groupid}/admins` Similar endpoint like for removing group members. ```json { "admins": [ "string" ] } ``` As of my applications, adding a new field to a JSON object would be a non-breaking change.
